result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Arraignment at 10-27-2015 01:00 pm

Defendant Zachary E Voldberg in court with attorney Gary R Mccartan.  James Jay Rennicke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Time set for prelim hearing in 15CF78, 15CF92, 15CF93, 15CF94 and initial appearance in cases 15CF136 15CF138, 15CF140.  

As to the initial appearance cases 15CF136, 138 and 140.  Mccartan states that DE has not been served with CC in those cases.  DA gives copies of CC to attorney and DE.  Mccartan agrees to go ahead with IA.  15CF136, 138 and 140, waive reading of CC.  Mccartan will waive time limits.  Bonds will be concurrent in ALL cases, No contact with Jerry Crouse, N6500 Maple Lane, Hawkins, Kelly and Ray Bloomer and Bruce Fischer, W601 School Forest Ln Hawkins.  Set for prelim hearing at 1:00 pm on 10-27-15.  

Mccartan states he just received a stipulation from the DA regarding evidence that was seized, Mccartan signed the stipulation.   

In cases 15CF78, 92, 93, 94 - set for prelim hearing today.  

15CF78, State calls Dep Engel sworn -1:11 pm.  State, direct.  Mccartan cross.  State calls Phil Grassman, oath given -1:18 pm.  State, direct.  Mccartan, cross -1:21 pm.  State, redirect.  Mccartan, recross -1:26 pm.  State filed information in case 15CF78.  State asking for case 78 to be bind over, Mccartan asking that 78 be dismissed.  Court will not dismiss 78 and will bind over.  Set 15CF78 for arraignment at 1:00 pm on 10-27-15.  

15CF92, State direct with Grassman, Mccartan cross -1:33 pm.  Mccartan asking for case 15CF92 be dismissed.  State asking that case be bind over.  Court will bind over. Mccartan asking case be dismissed.   Information has been filed.  10-27-15 at 1:00 for arraignment.  

15CF93 - State direct, Grassman still under oath.  Mccartan, cross -1:38 pm.  Mccartan asking that case be dismissed.  Information has been filed in this matter.  Court will bind over.  Set for arraignment on 10-27-15 at 1:00.  

15CF94 - State direct, Grassman still under oath.  Mccartan cross.  Court will bind over.  Mccartan asking case be dismissed.  Information has been filed in this matter.  Set for arraignment on 10-27-15 at 1:00 pm.

Court adj 1:45 pm.
